content: **crocheted hat in drops bomull-lin the piece is worked top down with treble and double crochets and an edge of lobster stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #kissmekatehat drops design pattern l-171 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m l/xl fits head-size approx 54/56 58/60 cm **yarn** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100 g colour 11 beige 50-50 g colour 21 dark blue if you wish to work the hat with just one colour you will need 100-150 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 17 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm 17 double crochets in width and 20 row in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
